ESCCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/22/0x8aa32161c71fbaa6f71b65615f3d58dba883ba6f.sol#400-442) does not use the value returned by external calls:

ESCCrowdsale.transferTokens (/unique_chucks/22/0x8aa32161c71fbaa6f71b65615f3d58dba883ba6f.sol#443-450) does not use the value returned by external calls:

ESCCrowdsale.finalization (/unique_chucks/22/0x8aa32161c71fbaa6f71b65615f3d58dba883ba6f.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(wallet,tokenSold.div(10)) (/unique_chucks/22/0x8aa32161c71fbaa6f71b65615f3d58dba883ba6f.sol)
